    • Method Detail

      • syncUsers

        @POST
 @Path(value="{componentId}/sync")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
SynchronizationResultRepresentation syncUsers(@PathParam(value="componentId")
                                                                                                                            String componentId,
                                                                                                                            @QueryParam(value="action")
                                                                                                                            String action)
        If the provider supports synchronization, this will invoke it. Action can be "triggerFullSync" or "triggerChangedUsersSync"
        Parameters:
        componentId -
        action -
        Returns:

      • syncMapperData

        @POST
 @Path(value="{componentId}/mappers/{mapperId}/sync")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
SynchronizationResultRepresentation syncMapperData(@PathParam(value="componentId")
                                                                                                                                                    String componentId,
                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="mapperId")
                                                                                                                                                    String mapperId,
                                                                                                                                                    @QueryParam(value="direction")
                                                                                                                                                    String direction)
        REST invocation for initiating sync for an ldap mapper. This method may be moved in the future. Right now don't have a good place for it. direction is "fedToKeycloak" or "keycloakToFed"
        Parameters:
        componentId -
        mapperId -
        direction -
        Returns:
